product_name: The North Face Torrent 4 Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: The North Face Torrent 4 hydration pack will help keep you hydrated and feeling light as a feather. It features a comfortable harness and just enough space to carry your outdoor essentials. Comfortable shoulder straps and vented back panel offer all-day comfort; webbing hipbelt adds stability. Innovative "doughnut" reservoir features a hole in the middle that enhances ventilation and helps prevent bulging. Fleece-lined media pocket provides a cozy nest for your smart phone or music player. The North Face Torrent 4 hydration pack features a stash pocket and attachment points for a helmet and trekking poles on the front panel.
short_description: The North Face Torrent 4 hydration pack will help keep you hydrated and feeling light as a feather. It features a comfortable harness and just enough space to carry your outdoor essentials.
